concept.title: 242.7201 Definitions.

conbody.p: “Acceptable material management and accounting system,” “material management and accounting system,” and “valid time-phased requirements” are defined in the clause at 252.242-7004 , Material Management and Accounting System.
“Significant deficiency” is defined in the clause at 252.242.7004, Material Management and Accounting System.
